visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object that renders a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly rainfall data with the series name 'Rainfall'. Additionally, the chart should have custom colors and additional configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart type is specified as 'spline', and the background color is set to a light gray shade. The chart has custom margins to provide better spacing around the chart area. The x-axis and y-axis are styled with specific colors and font sizes for their labels and titles. The data series includes monthly rainfall data with the series name 'Rainfall', and a custom color is applied to the series. The legend is enabled and styled with a specific font color and size. Additionally, loading configurations are set to show and hide the loading state with a duration of 1000 milliseconds.
